title.@value: 46,XX disorders of sex development induced by androgens of maternal origin

definition.@value: This refers to 46,XX disorders of sex development induced by any natural or synthetic compound, usually a steroid hormone, that stimulates or controls the development and maintenance of male characteristics in vertebrates by binding to androgen receptors, of maternal origin.
